meanings.definition: A lord or sovereign to whom allegiance and service are due.
meanings.sent1: The lieges of the king gathered to pledge their loyalty.
meanings.sent2: The knight served his lieges faithfully in battle.
meanings.sent3: The lieges of the queen threw her a surprise party to show their allegiance.
meanings.sent4: The lieges of the land stood united like a shield around their ruler.
meanings.sent5: In the kingdom, the lieges honored their king with grand celebrations.

meanings.sent1: She was known as the most devoted of all his lieges.
meanings.sent2: The lieges of the wise old sage listened attentively to his teachings.
meanings.sent3: The lieges of the chef eagerly awaited his new recipe creations.
meanings.sent4: Her lieges followed her lead with unwavering trust and respect.
meanings.sent5: The lieges of the hero cheered him on as he bravely faced the dragon.
